description:
Angelina was hit by a car and left for dead. With the help of the Agency, she was reborn as Angelica - but the negative side effects of the cybernetic implants began to show.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il Principe del Regno Della Pasta (Makarna Krallığı`nın Prensi)
Il Principe del Regno della Pasta (The Prince of the Kingdom of Pasta)
Le Prince du royaume des pâtes (Il principe del regno della pasta)
